text.section:
Sec. 2-281. Department organization and operating procedures.
The organization and operating procedures of the Department shall be prescribed in administrative orders and regulations of the Manager. The Manager is hereby authorized to transfer all or any part of the duties of the Aviation Department to such other Departments of Miami-Dade County as he deems proper, by appropriate administrative order. Should he deem it proper, the County Manager is hereby authorized to transfer all or any part of the duties of any other department of Miami-Dade County to the Aviation Department, by appropriate administrative order. All transferred duties shall be compatible with the other duties of the department or departments affected by any such transfer.
